website_summaries.verdict: A porta-potti with a slightly larger seat lid for comfort and a flushing function.
pros: Comes with a sample set of deodorizer packs
No odor problems on this model
Pour spout on waste end rotates to make it easier to empty
cons: Toilet paper does not flush well into this toilet
You will have to dispose of it in a trash can instead

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am a lady truck driver and this is perfect! Fits right under my bed. I don't have to worry about waking up and getting dressed to go into the truck stop to use the restroom in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5,000 miles, 10 states, 20 days...
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for camping with kids! We packed this on our 5,000 mile, 10 state trip...with 5 kids. Used this in the tent, yurts and camper cabins so we would not have to make nightime potty runs. Easy to clean, used baking soda for deodorizer. Was never smelly and never leaked. We won't do a road trip with out this great little potty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I actually think it's more convienent than dealing with the black water tank in the camper. When it's full I just take it to the nearest restroom and pour it in the toilet. I do wish it sat a little higher off the ground, that the lid was strong enough to sit on, and the indicator that shows that its full is diffiuclt to see.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T.

customer_reviews.title: Eurovan Camper friendly
customer_reviews.text: A nice unit with no leakage or spilling. Good fit and finish. Compact enough to fit in the rear bay of my eurovan camper without having to worry about it tipping over while in transit. Wish it was less expensive, but after having seen my neighbor's cheap extruded plastic knock-off all I can say is "you get what you pay for"
customer_reviews.author: Fly hunter

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO FLUSH AND SIMPLE TO TAKE APART and snap ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW....THIS TOILET really WORKS.....NO ODORS,,,DEEP BOWL,,,,EASY TO FLUSH AND SIMPLE TO TAKE APART and snap back together again ......also like the piston pump...PLEASED WITH MY PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie M.

customer_reviews.title: BEST brand in the biz
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a pop-up camper. You simply can't go wrong with Thetford. I've had another brand of portable toilet that was a nightmare leaking horrible. The Thetford one is top-of-the-line ......pay the extra money it is so WORTH it! Period.
customer_reviews.author: deerpath

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made for my campervan. I generally use it first thing in the morning and last thing at night to save myself from having to walk to BR in my PJ's. I've had it several months- no odor, no leaking, and easy to empty and clean. I use the chemical additive it came with and bought an extra couple bottles to keep on hand. Slides discreetly under the bed when not in use. Saved me on a couple of occasions when a "bathroom emergency" happened.
customer_reviews.author: Salsa

customer_reviews.title: Just got back from a 5300 mi trip across the country
customer_reviews.text: We did it! We hit 5 national parks in 2 weeks in our trip around the country during the pandemic. We used this in campsites, parking lots, road-side stops, etc. When we needed it, we used it in conjunction with a greenegg pop-up tent. I put it in last, and when my family had to go..we went. I found that if I waited till it was full, it was easier to dump. As much as I hated dealing with the extra hassle of this act, it was incredibly convenient. There were no smells, it did not leak, it worked great. ** Especially on the border of Colorado and Wyoming...where there was nothing but sagebrush.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I paid $170 for a product worth about $40. Like any cheap porta pottiy, this is essentially two plastic boxes stacked on top of each other. But even for such a simple device, quality control from Thetford appears poor. The product arrived missing the water cap, a small but important piece. This piece is as obvious as the toilet seat, so either an employee packed the potty into its box with his/her eyes closed, or they noticed the piece was missing and packed it anyway. Thetford did not respond to my email request for a replacement cap, so this brand new product was returned to Amazon. Summary: Cheap product, high price, poor quality control, unresponsive manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is top notch!! My wife and I are truck drivers and use this on a daily basis. The fact that it splits in half so your only have to carry the tank is not only convenient but very practical. Zero issues with this at all. One note if you are traveling through high altitudes you might want to crack it open just to release the pressure so it doesn’t swell.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Best one yet. I am a mobile dog groomer, and I buy one of these portable toilets every few years; this model is the most comfortable and the most well built of the many I have purchased yet. The swish is perfectly aligned for perfect flushes every time. The seat is a scoch bit wider than the other smaller units...making a big difference, and the seals are totally water tight. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: I love this toilet and use every day thank to the amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am a female truck driver and its hard for female to use restroom while on truck but am so happy since I got this toilet i dont have to make frequent stop to the restroom anymore when I asked my husband to buy this he said not thats not good but I bought this when i got that my husband love it now he used more than me and when he use and everytime say it’s really good toilet easy to use and easy to clean just make sure to get the smell odor
customer_reviews.author: Amanpreet kaur

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. Went on a camping trip with 5 yr old twins and it rained the majority of 3 days with strong winds. Saved us from leaving the tent during bad weather. We did have to dump this right about 24 hrs after setup cuz we put our toilet paper in it. Would have lasted longer if we had not. The deodorant was great... no smells at all! I'm very pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: NaMi

customer_reviews.title: Compact,  easy to use, no stench!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time recently, and was pleasantly surprised how good it works. Didn't get a chance to try #2, but I think with holding the trap door open I think it would do a good job. Flush is really good and gets the whole bowl. Dumping was easy, and when we got home a few quick rinses and air dry next to a box fan was all it needed. I used walex Porta pak tablet and there was no stench at all. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: We use this for car camping so that we won't have to make the long trek to the bathroom at night. We keep it not far from our sleeping bags and doesn't smell -- only a faint whiff of the deoderizer which isn't unpleasant. Flushes nicesly (we pump it twice just to make sure the bowl stays clean.) Very easy to dump and clean: we rinse with a bleach solution after camping and let it dry outside.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Cost more than other brands but the reason is quite obvious when using this product. I am very happy with my Porta Potti. Easy to use and easy to clean. Locks into place from the bottom container unlike other portable toilets. No leaks very sanitary and no smell after using. Would not recommend leaving waste inside for an extended period.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepguy

customer_reviews.title: Still on the road after 15 years.
customer_reviews.text: We have had a Volkswagon Westfalia pop-up camper for 15 years. My decided she wanted an indoor option for her bathroom needs. It is more difficult for her to go outside at night than for me. She loves it. It fits her need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David Guzzetta

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit all around.
customer_reviews.text: I have had older PortaPottis and this beats them all. Well made. Smooth and easy to clean. Easy to fill and dump. I couldn't be more pleased, and plan to use this for short weekends in my RV where I don't want to use the Black tank. Also to carry in the bed of my truck (under cap) for emergency use while on the road and when I can't find a clean restroom these days. This should last for years, and if by chance I have an issue, it is a great company that has been around for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Craig V. I.

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and the operation
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect here. But I got it and tried it. I like the size and the operation. It packed in the car very nicely and only took up a small space in my tent. Nice not have to leave the tent in the middle of the night! Used for 4 days and never a small of any kind. I'm pleased with my choice. It will be on each camping trip with me. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product~!
customer_reviews.text: Well engineered product. It works and ti doesn't leak. What more need be said.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's a few dollars more, but well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We've used porta potties awhile for camping and traveling with kids. When it was time for a new one, I was going to get the cheapest one, but now I'm glad I got this one. If you need a porta pottie, look no further and buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and cozy
customer_reviews.text: small toilet needs chair or some table. pump the water same as regular toilet. you can use for 3~5days to dump
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Jung

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Had a large gathering this summer at my place and not enough bathrooms. Purchased this and placed it in a privacy room and it was used many times by the visitors. They all found it acceptable and reused it without hesitation. Works well and easy to set-up, empty and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect potty for pop-up
customer_reviews.text: The Thetford 92850 was well worth the money for camping with little kids! Used it all summer during camping trips (5 trips). No leaking. Worked perfectly. Easy to empty and care for. The perfect size- it fit in the cupboard in my Jayco Qwest pop-up camper.
customer_reviews.author: K&B

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit and just what I was wanting. Have used this several trips and the only minor issue is if you press down on the water knob too hard a little clean water can splash out the side of the seat. Just have to remember to not gorilla the thing. Empties good, easy to carry. Fits nicely in my small Four Wheel Camper. You may want the larger tank version if you have the room and plan to use more than four big ones between empties.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It now leaks at the vent when I go to dump it all over my hand. It needs to be replaced. It was too expensive to leak so soon. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Grace

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap, this is an outstanding portable toilet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase based on Amazon and other online reviews. Combined with the BioPak treatment pods, this toilet can contain multiple days of waste, inside a closed camper van, during a heat wave. No leaks or foul smells during storage, and minimal nastiness during the flushing process. Only trick is the limited flush-water volume, however, the piston flusher makes the best of a challenging problem. The emptying process is simple and low-risk due to the adjustable output nozzle, which will work at an RV dump or a regular indoor toilet. Simple to clean. Compact enough to slide under the bed/seat platform in our low-roof camper.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: STINKS without solutions or avid cleaning
customer_reviews.text: We just tried out the method of going without chemicals, but every time we would use it in our van, the entire space reeked of stale urine. A couple times in between, we would dump in some baking soda and vinegar, but that did almost nothing. Once I get a chance to bleach the whole thing, I will not go without doing something about the smell.
customer_reviews.author: ahaakonson2012

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but cleaning is messy
customer_reviews.text: Loved using this instead of the dirty bathrooms at the campground, but cleaning it made me gag. It makes a big mess because it splashes. Not sure I want to put myself through that again.
customer_reviews.author: dab

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this porta-potty
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this porta-potty. My large 6 ft. tall husband is comfortable using it too. Easy to move and easy to clean. No spillage . . . ever.
customer_reviews.author: stillsparkling

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to camping gear.
customer_reviews.text: We car camp and keep this next to our tent in a small enclosure. It beats trying to find our way to the park restroom or porta potty in the middle of the night. We have talked to other campers that use it and have heard only good reviews. If you have a big enough tent it can be inside!
customer_reviews.author: Farm girl

customer_reviews.title: On the small side for a tall adult
customer_reviews.text: To low and seat is too small to be comfortable for a tall adult...otherwise worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived; NO SAMPLE CHEMICALS PROVIDED
customer_reviews.text: Our new Thetford just arrived but there are no samples chemicals in the box. Now I have to scrambled to get some since I expected to use the samples on our trip this weekend. Will update my review after our weekend use.
customer_reviews.author: Toni McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Gotta go go.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new potti. I wish I got the larger capacity..but this will do. I have a campervan(grandcaravan) fits perfectly. Easy 2 use. And clean. Must use rv tissue. Reg paper doesnt break down.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I was intimidate at first but I love my little toilet
customer_reviews.text: I was intimidate at first but I love my little toilet. Very user friendly. Simple and easy to carry, Light weight
customer_reviews.author: JANIS C

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a boat, but I think I want one in every room in my house.
customer_reviews.author: TumbleHome

customer_reviews.title: Convient & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a camping trip in our van out west. It was so convenient to have a toilet while traveling down the road. It was easy to clean, didn't have any odor except when open you could smell the deodorizer. I would highly recommend this for camping, boating or traveling.
customer_reviews.author: I. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great solution, great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with how well this little toilet works. It's easy to clean, no smell and was definitely the right solution for my sprinter build.
customer_reviews.author: ColoMtnHigh777

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: A well made product that fulfills it’s intended purpose. However, be aware that solids (paper, stool) do not empty completely on the first pour requiring additional water and sloshing to completely empty the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Macmonter

customer_reviews.title: We only use it for "Number 1" so it's easy to dump and clean
customer_reviews.text: Just what the wife needs in our pop up. Our last Thetford lasted about 10 years until the fresh water reservoir started leaking around the seam. We only use it for "Number 1" so it's easy to dump and clean.
customer_reviews.author: kzoo1

customer_reviews.title: As advertised !
customer_reviews.text: as shown i like the quality, plan to use it soon. Easy to assemble and remove great instruction booklet. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: rubi david

customer_reviews.title: Potty training
customer_reviews.text: I loved it ! My daughter is 3 and big lady so she didn’t want to go to the big toilet and the little one she did a big mess . This one is just right for her height !
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and in perfect condition. I haven't used it yet but I have tested it with clean water. I wanted to make sure it didn't leak. It didn't leak and I am very happy! My last one leaked clear water and I always had a little puddle when I took it apart to empty the holding tank.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wampler

customer_reviews.title: Made well works just fine. Seat a bit narrow for adult but no ...
customer_reviews.text: Made well works just fine. Seat a bit narrow for adult but no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Year of the Ox

customer_reviews.title: Just got it, but it looks good so far
customer_reviews.text: Use it for a place to "go" while camping in a converted cargo trailer.
customer_reviews.author: prime suspect

customer_reviews.title: Handy for Camping
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what we wanted it to do. We use it camping and have a shower tent and we use it in there as well as in our van at night so we don't have to walk across the camp ground or truck stop. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: When you gotta go and don't have plumbing
customer_reviews.text: Went throught hurricane Michael..has been a life saver..not tall enough husband had to build box for it to seat on.
customer_reviews.author: Celena B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Great in our tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for use in a semi-truck! Works well just as described!
customer_reviews.author: Thx4urBiz

customer_reviews.title: Great valve for the price
customer_reviews.text: Clean water tank shouldn’t really have a larger capacity than the black water capacity, but other than that it works great. Careful not to have water or waste in the bowl when separating the two halves.
customer_reviews.author: Jn76

customer_reviews.title: Good product but haven’t used it yet.
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made product but I had no use of it so far. It end up in my garage waiting to be used soon or later.
customer_reviews.author: JYBE

customer_reviews.title: So easy to empty!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Thetford portable we have had and liked them both. The first last us 9 years. The capacity of the waste reservoir isn't as large as the first we had but the newer features are very nice. The flush mechanism works great and the swivel tube for emptying is a great feature. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W Fox

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind...
customer_reviews.text: Never used.However, such a peace of mind if emergency arises. Keep in the trunk of my ford fiesta so if 90s parents are traveling with me we may travel with more certainty of success. Thank you for the lightweight that I can handle on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ANGRY that Expensive $180 Item is INCOMPLETE!
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed! I ordered a Brand New Thetford 92814 Porta Potti 345! Upon opening box, I could Not Find an Instruction Pamphlet, the LID Will NOT OPEN & NEW POTTI is Missing 4 important Parts! How can a Brand New Unit be Missing Parts?
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase  of 2015
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases we have made.We use it for out pup-up camper as well as road trips in our suv for our girls that are 3 and 5. Make life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: james m.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Just piston pump moves a little bit hard, but overall good quality and price. Use it on my boat. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alexey N

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but easy to scratch
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but easy to scratch. Had one trip and plastic all covered with scars and dust in it. New look is gone. Wish the material is made off be more durable and scratch resistance.
customer_reviews.author: makdim

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and is easy to clean. It beats driving around looking so a tank dump station too.
customer_reviews.author: arctic poppy

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used the Porta Potti for our trek to see the Eclipse in August 17. Works well and easy to use, maintain and clean.
customer_reviews.author: TPV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to have around camp
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to have around camp, the wife doesn't have to run off through the woods to find the other toilets!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally something good for my boat. Mom won’t have to hold no more
customer_reviews.author: Andy D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good portable toilet while camping or if you just need to get out of the house ;-)
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Better have it and not need it , than need it and not have it!
customer_reviews.text: It's almost like using the toilet but exactly like the RV toilet, just a smaller black tank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever!!! We use this for camping and it so convenient! Don't go camping without. Best investment ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Good As They Get
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, Porta Potti's are not fun but if you have to make use of one this model and brand is as good as they get. Easy to operate, empty, clean and does not leak or smell.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are NOT correct for this item!
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions listed for this product are not correct. In two places the add list the dimensions as, 12.2 X 13.4 X 15 inches which would have fit perfectly in the designated space in my truck camper. Unfortunately the ACTUAL dimensions are, 13.4 X 15 X 16.5 inches, which will not fit in my camper. I am frustrated that I have wasted my time and will now have to deal with sending this item back.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: great in the camper
customer_reviews.text: this is a great portable for camping. nice size..doesn't take up too much room no oder with the use of the included order control liquid.
customer_reviews.author: MsDoo

customer_reviews.title: We love this portable toilet
customer_reviews.text: We love this portable toilet. Works great on long road trips with little ones. Small and not to cumbersome. Great design. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is well made and it fits perfectly under the bunk in our Scamp 16 without any odor. It's mostly for my wife and daughter but even I, at 6 feet plus and over 200 lbs can use it.
customer_reviews.author: JAL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and minimizes trips to the house or putting the grandkids in the water!
customer_reviews.author: gjmank

customer_reviews.title: No odors & great for trucker's
customer_reviews.text: No odors... I'm a trucker and I store it under my bed out of the way in my kenworth t680.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S.

customer_reviews.title: this one is great..
customer_reviews.text: as far as porta potties go, this one is great . . . easy and sanitary to maintain . . .
customer_reviews.author: Tom Beach

customer_reviews.title: Good product and still working
customer_reviews.text: Had for over a year now and still working well. In almost daily use. Just wish I had gotten one a little taller, it's hard get so low to the ground to use but it works very well and it's easy to clean. Would recommend. Also the fill indicator is a nice feature to let you know its getting close to full
customer_reviews.author: Tom Brent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything we need for our six year old to navigate long road trips.
customer_reviews.author: User 1 tx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent port-a-potty for our pop-up camper. Easy to store, easy to use, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camping ⛺️ toilet
customer_reviews.text: You will love this potti easy to use no smell but do use the liquid for the poti comes with some
customer_reviews.author: Timothy LaBore

customer_reviews.title: Great design,  great size, works perfect
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our boat and it is a great size to handle several days of use. The tank is just the right size to handle easily when it is full. The design is great as it keeps the drain pipe over the waste chamber so no worries of leaks. Water flush is strong and covers the whole bowl.
customer_reviews.author: SPsail

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My two year old ended up stinking us out during our trip. While driving over a long bridge, he decided that he could not wait to poop. However, we didn't smell anything once we let our windows down and flushed the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: yoruba foster

customer_reviews.title: Met our expectations.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something small (easily portable) to take in our camper van. It met all of our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Does the job, my toddlers love it
customer_reviews.author: Greco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is our second rv and second Thetford porta toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Wills

customer_reviews.title: Better than two generic off brands that leaked horribly
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted. Well built. It flushes. Hasn't leaked yet. Arrived before expected. Better than two generic off brands that leaked horribly. This unit works exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Ajzmundt

customer_reviews.title: It's surprisingly high quality and works great, with no mess
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use in my popup camper, mainly for the kid. It's surprisingly high quality and works great, with no mess. My daughter also thinks it's hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Well designed. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but very pleased with construction and design. Relatively small "footprint". I'm 6 foot, 185 lbs and found it to be stable and comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: bruceian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean and maintain
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Thetford Porta Potti for our small trailer. It's slightly lower height allows it to be stowed under the dinette seat while we're on the road. It's wonderful not to have to use campground potties in the middle of the night! The Thetford is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Used on the first pop up trip with our girls who are 3 and 6 came in really handy at night. Really solid design and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this porta potti
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this porta potti. This went on my boat as a replacement. Like size of lid. Big guy and have no issues using when taking care of business. Pump works great for fresh water flush. Easy to take to pump out station. Plastic is sturdy and well constructed. If for boat you need to buy hold down bracket. Wish it would come with unit. Cant go wrong with this Thetford model.
customer_reviews.author: Maritime T-Shirts

customer_reviews.title: Replacing 20 year old predessor of this model.  I figure if the old one lasted 20 years this one will too!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing one very similar that is 20 years old. I can still get repair parts for my old one, but decided that 20 years of service is a good product statement so I got this new one. Design refinements are well thought out. This is a basic unit, like my previous one. Expect many years of good service from this new one.
customer_reviews.author: Bully B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the boat. Just an emergency measure, but better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence E.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased Customer
customer_reviews.text: Tried the Coleman porta potti first. Ordered it from Wal Mart. The pump did not work unless you took it apart and primed it before each flush. Returned it to Wal Mart for a total refund. Then based on numerous customer reviews ordered the Thetford 320P porta potti from Amazon. It works great, and the superb quality is very obvious. Couldn't be more pleased. It really is worth what we paid for it. Should have stayed with Thetford the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: ... know I bought a portable toilet should be package better.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for letting my neighborhood know I bought a portable toilet should be package better. UPDATE 8/10/2018 NOT EVEN A YEAR LATER IT LEAKS WHILE YOU USE IT. CHANGING MY RATING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks to be a nice potti.
customer_reviews.text: I opted for the pump model instead of bellows, as my last bellows cracked after a couple years, and they are not cheap to replace. This looks to be a nice potti....however, it does not come with mounting hardware. Add another 30 bucks for 2 little plastic pieces and a few screws, and it's no longer a great deal. Operation is similar to every other portable out there.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisr

customer_reviews.title: works great, no issues for me
customer_reviews.text: This portable toilet. works great, no issues for me. I built a platform to set it on to match the height of our high home toilet. The smaller bottom tank is easier to empty (lighter weight). Very well built, holds my 260 lbs.weight with no sign of collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: toolman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to be used in our tent trailer for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to be used in our tent trailer for my wife's middle of the night, bathroom run. Have not used it as of yet but plan to next month.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for vans
customer_reviews.text: This is a great porta potty for camping or van life. Will last days to a week of use depending on how many are using it. We only use it for #1 so it takes a while to fill up. No smells when you use the proper chemicals and a full water tank will last you at least two empty’s of the waste tank.
customer_reviews.author: TDi

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for camping with the family
customer_reviews.text: Took it camping for the kids to use in the middle of the night. Works great, easy to use, and empty. Flushing mechanism works really well and I love how compact it is. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: Great potty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel potty. No smell at all, even in the heat of summer. Easy to use. I highly recommend this potty.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

product_meta.title: Thetford 92850 Porta Potti 320P Portable Toilet for RV, Marine, Camping, Healthcare Toddler Training, Trucks, Vans
product_meta.description:
Color:Grey

Porta Potti 320P was designed to offer the convenience and comfort of a toilet while you’re traveling or out camping. With a compact and durable construction, this portable toilet can be used in RVs, trucks, vans or any other vehicles.

Easy to maneuver even when is full, thanks to the compact design and the ergonomic carrying handle, Porta Potti 320P features two holding tanks: a fresh water tank, with a capacity of 4.2 gallons (15.9l), and a waste water holding tank, with a capacity of 3.2 gallons (12.2l).

Model 320P uses a piston flush system averages 33 flushes with every full fresh water tank. The waste water tank comes with a level indicator and the exclusive Pour-Out Spout, preventing any backsplashes during the emptying process.

Porta Potti 320P comes with white top and gray bottom and has the following dimensions:

 * H: 13-7/16 (34cm) – from top to bottom – lid closed,
 * L: 16-1/2in (41.9cm) – from front to back,
 * W: 15in (38.1cm) – from side to side.

Highlights:

 * VERSATILITY: Suited for RVs, trucks and vans, healthcare, camping, an off-the-grid lifestyle and more
 * DESIGN: Durable, compact and easy to use
 * FUNCTIONALITY: Ergonomic carrying handle; bellows pump flush
 * SANITARY: Sealed valve to prevent odors from escaping the holding tank
 * CONVENIENCE: Removable seat and cover for easy cleaning
 * INNOVATIVE: Exclusive, rotating pour-out spout
 * DIMENSIONS: 17 x 15 x 13.4 inches
 * CAPACITY: 4.2-gal. fresh water tank; 3.2-gal. waste water tank
feature_bullets: Suited for RVs, trucks and vans, healthcare, camping, an off-the-grid lifestyle and more
Durable, compact and easy to use, with ergonomic carrying handle
Sealed valve to prevent odors escaping the holding tank
Removable seat and cover for easy cleaning and exclusive, rotating pour-out spout
17 x 15 x 13.4 inches ; 4.2-gal. fresh water tank; 3.2-gal. waste water tank
